snippet: Carlos Tevez became the latest high-profile international player to join the Chinese Super League when Shanghai Shenhua confirmed the signing of the Argentine striker from his boyhood club Boca Juniors on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Carlos Tevez became the latest high-profile international player to join the Chinese Super League when Shanghai Shenhua confirmed the signing of the Argentine striker from his boyhood club Boca Juniors on Thursday.

headline.main: Tevez Agrees to Join China Club Shanghai Shenhua
headline.print_headline: Tevez Agrees to Join China Club Shanghai Shenhua
